title: Child's Dress, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed plain weave (chintz)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert P. Brown
description: Infant's dress with a pattern of delicate floral sprays in blue, red, lavender, and brown on white. The skirt is gathered into a yoke, which has a draw-string neckline, with short sleeves; open down the back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Child's Dress, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed plain weave (chintz). Gift of Mrs. Robert P. Brown. 1960-81-9.
